Name: A Bonafide Special Blue Chicken
Author: rikai
Description: A small mod that makes blue chickens a little more interesting.

Meta:Changelog.3.0.0: Refactored code to simplify things. Fixed config not saving properly. Added support for the Auto-grabber. New drop added.
Meta:Changelog.2.3.0: Updated for Stardew Valley 1.6 and SMAPI 4.0
